db:abstract.db:para: W3C Software Notice and Document License (2015-05-13).

db:article.db:para: The xml.xsd file provided by W3C describes the XML namespace, in a form suitable for import by other schema documents.
Used for implementing validation of the the XML schema.
The sources can be found in qtxmlpatterns/src/xmlpatterns/schema/schemas/xml.xsd.
W3C Software Notice and Document License (2015-05-13).
